headline: SEMPREX MICROSCOPE STAND
description: Microscope Stand w/ Transmitted Light Stage    Microscope Stand Microscope and E-arm not included
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Microscope Parts and Accessories > Stands
specstable:
Manufacturer Semprex
Model D102
Type Transmitted Light
Other Information Manual Transmitted Light Stage:
X- 6" travel
Y- 5" travel
6.5" x 6.5" Clear glass insert

Variable 25 watt halogen illumination
32 mm round post with L-arm.
Stand can be used with Nikon E-arm Model UA1 and Nikon Stereozoom microscope. Check our inventory for availability.
Microscope and E-arm not included

Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.250 in (36.2 cm)
Depth 14.500 in (36.8 cm)
Height 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
Power Requirements 110 V
